generic.title: {{message}}
generic.description: Something went wrong. Please retry or contact us.

AccountNameRequired.title: An account name is required
AccountNameRequired.description: Please provide with an account name

BtcUnmatchedApp.title: That's the wrong app
BtcUnmatchedApp.description: Open the ‘{{managerAppName}}’ app on your device

DeviceSocketFail.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketFail.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DeviceSocketNoBulkStatus.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketNoBulkStatus.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DeviceSocketNoHandler.title: Oops, try again
DeviceSocketNoHandler.description: Some connection failed, so please try again.

DisconnectedDevice.title: Oops, device was disconnected
DisconnectedDevice.description: The connection to the device was lost, so please try again.

HardResetFail.title: Oops, could not reset
HardResetFail.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

LatestMCUInstalledError.title: Oops, nothing to update
LatestMCUInstalledError.description: Needlessly tried to update the device microcontroller. Contact Ledger Support if there's a problem with your device.

LedgerAPIError.title: Sorry, try again (API HTTP {{status}})
LedgerAPIError.description: Interacting with Ledger's API server went wrong. Please retry.

LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.title: Oops, {{message}}
LedgerAPIErrorWithMessage.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

LedgerAPINotAvailable.title: Sorry, {{currencyName}} services unavailable
LedgerAPINotAvailable.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support.

ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.title: Oops, that's already installed.
ManagerAppAlreadyInstalled.description: Check your device to see which apps are already installed.

ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.title: Bitcoin or Ethereum app required
ManagerAppRelyOnBTC.description: Either install the latest Ethereum app (for ETC/UBIQ/EXP/RSK/WAN/kUSD/POA), or the latest Bitcoin app.

ManagerDeviceLocked.title: Please unlock your device
ManagerDeviceLocked.description: Your device was locked. Please unlock it.

ManagerNotEnoughSpace.title: Sorry, insufficient device storage
ManagerNotEnoughSpace.description: Uninstall some apps to increase available storage and try again.

ManagerUninstallBTCDep.title: Sorry, this app is required
ManagerUninstallBTCDep.description: Uninstall the Bitcoin or Ethereum app last.

NoAddressesFound.title: Sorry, no accounts found
NoAddressesFound.description: Something went wrong with address calculation, try again or contact Ledger Support.

NotEnoughBalance.title: Oops, insufficient balance
NotEnoughBalance.description: Make sure the account to debit has sufficient balance

PasswordIncorrect.title: The password you entered is incorrect

TimeoutError.title: Oops, a time out occurred
TimeoutError.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TimeoutTagged.title: Oops, a time out occurred ({{tag}})
TimeoutTagged.description: It took too long for the server to respond.

TransportError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

TransportStatusError.title: Something went wrong. Please reconnect your device.

UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.title: Firmware update refused on device
UserRefusedFirmwareUpdate.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support

UserRefusedOnDevice.title: Transaction refused on device
UserRefusedOnDevice.description: Please retry or contact Ledger Support in case of doubt.

UserRefusedAddress.title: Receive address rejected
UserRefusedAddress.description: Please try again or contact Ledger Support

WrongDeviceForAccount.title: Oops, wrong device for ‘{{accountName}}’.
WrongDeviceForAccount.description: The connected device is not associated with the account you selected. Please connect the right device.

DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.title: Open Manager to update this App
DeviceAppVerifyNotSupported.description: The app verification is not supported

InvalidAddress.title: This is not a valid {{currencyName}} address

CantOpenDevice.title: Oops, couldn’t connect to device
CantOpenDevice.description: Device detected but connection failed. Please retry and get help if the problem persists.

ETHAddressNonEIP.title: Auto-verification not available: carefully verify the address
